Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.game_state

Class SavedGameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.game_state.GameState
it.polimi.ingsw.server.game_state.SavedGameState
public class SavedGameState extends GameState
Immutable class that represents the current status of the game. This is used for persistence

    • loadProfessors

      private static Map<Color,Player> loadProfessors(List<PlayerState> playerStates, ArrayList<Player> players)
      Infers a professor map from a list of Player states. Assumes the list is correct: a professor is not owned by more than one player
      Parameters:
      playerStates - a list of player states from a loaded game
      players - a list of players from the game
      Returns:
      an object which maps each color with the player who owns the professor of that color
